nodes.text: The Tebru system was a star system located within the Outer Rim Territories' Juris sector. It contained the rocky planet Tebru. The droid collector Toria Tell maintained a residence on Tebru during the Galactic Civil War.
The Tebru system was first mentioned in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which placed the system in grid square P-17.
